definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: There are welts on my thighs from Jason’sbelt.
sentences.chinese: 我的大腿上都是傑森用皮帶打的印子。

sentences.english: John was clothed in camel's hair and wore a leather garment around his waist.
sentences.chinese: 若翰身穿駱駝毛外衣，腰間束著皮帶。

sentences.english: A filtrate collection box sits underneath, and seals against, the upper belt.
sentences.chinese: 濾液收集盒緊靠着上方皮帶的下面密封。

sentences.english: Various speeds may be obtained by the use of large and small pulley.
sentences.chinese: 利用大小皮帶輪，可以獲得不同的速度。

sentences.english: Mainly design and make all kinds of belt conveyers, and strength conveyer system. For better personal development, I left there.
sentences.chinese: 主要設計製造各類皮帶運輸機，及氣力輸送系統。

sentences.english: Anything short of your belt makes you look like a rube.
sentences.chinese: 任何比皮帶短的東西都能是你像個土包子。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the design of press shaping mould for belt fastener of mine belt conveyor.
sentences.chinese: 介紹礦用帶式輸送機皮帶扣衝壓成型模具的設計。

sentences.english: Pop big buckle, we had many wood look colorway for choice or make your own color.
sentences.chinese: 特大皮帶扣，有多種木紋可供選購，亦可跟來色做貨。

sentences.english: Single-belt transportation, placidly and quickly , small friction, little waste.
sentences.chinese: 雙皮帶運膜，快速平穩，摩擦小，損耗少。

sentences.english: The mapper trapped in the gap tapped the tap wrapper with strap.
sentences.chinese: 陷在縫中的製圖者用皮帶輕擊塞子套套。

sentences.english: It's a simple machine with a belt and rollers that you move with your effort.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個簡單的機器用皮帶輥道，你將與你的努力。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the design of a belt tension measuring tool and its application research.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種皮帶張緊力檢具的設計及應用研究。

sentences.english: This example shows a troughing idler with the conveyor belt running to the left.
sentences.chinese: 本例顯示了皮帶向左側跑偏的情形。

sentences.english: Compact Models, Two Side-Belt Drive, Little Space.
sentences.chinese: 輕巧機型，雙側皮帶驅動，節省空間。

sentences.english: You just have to keep him on a tight leash.
sentences.chinese: 你要攏住他只須拉緊一根皮帶。

sentences.english: Install window glass channel and belt weatherstrip seals.
sentences.chinese: 安裝車窗玻璃滑動槽和皮帶防水飾條密封。

definition: to tie/bind or fasten together/to kidnap
belt/band/ribbon/strap/girdle/(coll.) audio or video tape/Farrer's scallop (Chlamys farreri)/comb pen shell (Atrina pectinata)
